entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R807R01
entry.content:
Dec 19, 22:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/12/2024 19:25 UTC
End Time : 19/12/2024 22:37 UTC
Service impact :We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 19, 19:43 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Dedicated Server in RBX8 in the rack R807R01, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details :

Start time : 19/12/2024 19:25 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack R807R01 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are replacing the network equipment.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G116A23 - G116A24 - G116A25 Incident Notification
entry.content:
Dec 20, 01:42 UTC
Update - Start time : 19/12/2024 21:25 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack G116A25 are up and running since 00:51 UTC. Our technical teams are working to restore servers in racks G116A23 and G116A24.
Root cause : Incident caused by an issue on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working on this issue.

Dec 19, 21:40 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Dedicated Server in GRA1 in the racks G116A23, G116A24 and G116A25, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details :

Start time : 19/12/2024 21:25 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the racks G116A23, G116A24 and G116A25 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Incident caused by an issue on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working on this issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 19, 21:34 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an issue on our services. We will update informations when we will have more details.

entry.title: [CA/APAC][Bare Metal] - server lifecycle processes incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 19, 04:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/12/2024 02:24 UTC
End Time : 19/12/2024 04:16 UTC
Service impact : The server lifecycle processes, including reopening, suspension, and deletion of dedicated servers, were slowed down.
We are pleased to inform you that the issue has been resolved, and all services have returned to normal.
Root cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
